title: Oru Koottu Kiliyaga Lyrics Padikathavan
stanzas:
Oru koottuk kiliyaaga
oru thoppuk kuyilaaga
paadu pan paadu

irai thaeda parandhaalum
dhisai maari thirindhaalum
koodu oru koodu.

Oru koottuk kiliyaaga
oru thoppuk kuyilaaga
paadu pan paadu

irai thaeda parandhaalum
dhisai maari thirindhaalum
koodu .. oru koodu.

[Sellum vazhi engengum
pallam varalaam.
ullam edhir paaraamal
vellam varalaam.

nermai adhu maaraamal
dharmam adhai meeraamal
naalum nadai podungal
niyanam peralaam. ] (2)

sathiyathai nee kaathirunthaal
sathiyam ungalai kaathirukkum
thaai thandha anbukkum
naan thandha panbukkum
poomaalai kaathirukkum.

Oru koottuk kiliyaaga
oru thoppuk kuyilaaga
paadu pan paadu

irai thaeda parandhaalum
dhisai maari thirindhaalum
koodu oru koodu.

[Nellin vidhai podaamal
nellum varumaa
vervai adhu sindhaamal
vellip panamaa

vellai ilam chittukkal
vettri kodi kattungal
sorgam adhai thattungal
vinnai thodungal.](2)

aanandha kanneeril
abishegam naan seidhen
en kannil eeram illai.

Oru koottuk kiliyaaga
oru thoppuk kuyilaaga
paadu pan paadu

irai thaeda parandhaalum
dhisai maari thirindhaalum
koodu oru koodu.
